title: MMR gain?
body:
I reached Gold 4 today after going on a 7 win streak. 
I've been checking op.gg for my elo (mmr) and it doesnt seem to be going up. I got 23lp for wins when other people are getting 27+ in preseason. I also have a 53% win rate. 
Does mmr not increase in preseason? Im confusing. 
Someone please clarify thanks.

replies.body:
1. MMR sites such as OP.GG aren't (and will never be) accurate or precise because they use their own calculations for approximation, not Riot's. 
2. That site actually stops calculating MMR at preseason, so your MMR is where it should be.
oh, so my mmr is definitely higher than what it says on the site?

> [{quoted}](name=Emhyr var Emreis,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=icAoVIiM,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-11-23T06:57:16.447+0000)
>
> oh, so my mmr is definitely higher than what it says on the site?

Well according to the site, yes it would be :)
Not necessarily, but relative to the op.gg mmr displayed, more than likely yes.
If you're getting 23 lp a win you're definitely above your ranks mmr, I'm only getting 27+ on flex and it's pretty impossible as far as I know to get that in solo q
